titleStmt.title: The pious soul's daily exercise: or, A guide to eternal glory Being manna gathered out of the Holy Scriptures to refresh the true Chrisitan in his passage through this vale of tears to the heavenly Canaan. By G.L.
titleStmt.author: G. L.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for John Marshall at the Bible in Grace-Church-Street,

notesStmt.note: At foot of title page: Where you may be supplied with Dr. Owen's, Mr. Bunyan's, and the late reverend Mr. Mead's works.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
